amendment.description: Amendment makes a technical correction and exempts individuals from provisions regarding political advocacy.
amendment.purpose: An amendment made in order by the rule and printed as amendment No. 1-2 in House Rept. 104-224, to make a correction and a technical change to section VI of the bill, relating to the provisions of the bill regarding political advocacy by specifying that the provisions are intended to affect only non-profit organizations, not individuals, who receive federal grants.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Porter amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
